Pre-Game Insights: Rovman Powell was named as the captain of the West Indies T20I side
Roston Chase will be his deputy
Andre Russell is one of the notable miss from the 15-member squad
Jason Holder has also rested for the South Africa T20I series on account of workload management
Others: The series will be played at Brian Lara Stadium, Tarouba, Trinidad on August 23, 24 and 27 respectively
